Speaker: Milo
Text: Guh!  You’re strong, but I’m not done yet!

Speaker: Milo
Text: No!  You didn’t show mercy to Mr. Fluffy!  This is payback!

Speaker: Agni
Text: We didn’t even touch Mr. Fluffy.  What the hell.

Speaker: Milo
Text: Well fine, but what about the others?!

Speaker: Agni
Text: Like, how were we supposed to save all of them?  They were slaughtering people!

Speaker: Kitty
Text: We didn’t ‘slaughter’ Mr. Fluffy.  Don’t you think you might be jumping to conclusions here?

Speaker: Milo
Text: You just said you didn’t save them all!

Speaker: Agni
Text: Look, Milo.  We saved as many as we could, okay?  But we couldn’t ignore the people in trouble either.

Speaker: Dr. G
Text: Milo, let’s put a stop to this before anyone else is hurt - monster or otherwise.

Speaker: Milo
Text: No, they’re depending on me!  There’s nothing to stop you from saying that and then mistreating them again!

Speaker: Milo
Text: Yeah, you’re right.  Let’s go home.
